Wildrider smiled broadly at the words of the two new recruits.  "Then,
we will conquer this miserable dust ball and then....." Megatron stopped
his ranting, and noticed them. "Ahhh yes, the Decepticon distress
signal." he moved forward, and pushed Wildrider and Drag-Strip out of
the way. Megatron put his arm with the fusion cannon to his chest to
announce himself. "I am Megatron. Leader of the Decepticons." He looked
down at them, for their response.
